author: Bloomberg News
title: Stocks slip lower after U.S. jobs plunge confirms coronavirus’ devastating toll on world’s largest economy
description: 'A lot of the bad news is already built into the market'
content:
U.S. stocks edged lower and the dollar held gains after a plunge in hiring last month confirmed the pandemic’s devastating toll on the world’s largest economy. Oil rallied on expected output curbs.
The S&P 500 opened in the red as investors digested the … [+2395 chars]
